items.title: Kamix v1.0.0-rc1 is out!
items.summary: Download Kamix v1.0.0-rc1 Bumping Kamix to `1.0.0-rc2`, this is the Volumes (`vfss`) update. It adds `vfs rename`, `vfs rm`, and `vfs copy`. Next update might add an environment variable system for things like the system version and configuration directory.
items.content_html:
Download Kamix v1.0.0-rc1

Bumping Kamix to `1.0.0-rc2`, this is the Volumes (`vfss`) update. It adds `vfs rename`, `vfs rm`, and `vfs copy`. Next update might add an environment variable system for things like the system version and configuration directory.
